12 Jan 2018

GitHub cracks me up. Every time I add a comment, it says that I commented “a minute from now”. I guess dates are hard or something.

12 Jan 2018

Got word tonight that my grandma is starting hospice care. She had a stroke a month after my wedding and has been effectively “gone” for about 6 years. It still hurts, though. I’m very much looking forward to Revelation 21:4 being fulfilled.

09 Jan 2018

I’m watching the latest Swift Talk from the Objc.io guys, and they are refactoring some layout code using UIOffset to introduce spacing. I’ve never heard of that type before! I love watching stuff like this even for no other reason than to learn little things like this.
